```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)

df <- read_csv("toiletmapexport_240901_074429.csv")
au <- st_read("AUS_STATES_2010.shp", quiet = TRUE)

ggplot(data = au) +
  geom_sf(size = 0.3, 
          fill = "white") +
  theme_minimal() +
  coord_sf(crs = 3112) + 
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "steelblue2"))
```
